article_title: Jim Cramer's 'Mad Money' Recap: An Industrial-Strength Rally
article_text:
11 Stocks to Buy if Donald Trump Builds His Wall

There are some companies you'll definitely want to pay attention to if Donald Trump gets to build his border wall -- and stocks you might want to invest in, too.

article_metadata.description: Jim Cramer's favorite stocks in the March 17 edition of Mad Money include: Intuit (INTU), Target (TGT) and Ventas (VTR).
article_metadata.author: Scott Rutt

og.description: Investors took their money out of drug stocks and banks and put them into industrials including Caterpillar, sending shorts flying, Cramer says.
og.title: Jim Cramer's 'Mad Money' Recap: An Industrial-Strength Rally

article_metadata.keywords: mad money, mad money recap, jim cramer, stocks, investment advice, investing, cramer
